str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To fill up, satisfy. Or empletho em-play'-tho; from en and the base of pleistos;to fill in, i.e. to satisfy.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A learner, disciple, pupil. From manthano; a learner, i.e. Pupil.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From sun and ago; to lead together, i.e. Collect or convene; specially, to entertain.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A fragment, broken piece. From klao; a piece.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Accusative Neuter Plural
str2: From perissos; to superabound, be in excess, be superfluous; also to cause to superabound or excel.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Neuter Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From apo and the base of olethros; to destroy fully, literally or figuratively.
